content.description: Follow the seams and knobs up and left of Bloody Panda. They share the same bolts and anchors.
content.location: Between Bloody Panda and Panda Club. The start is the ramp/dish shaped formation. Stay left of the bolts.

content.description: Climb a left facing corner/chimney system past several bolts to a bolted anchor.
content.protection: Four bolts with possible small cam down low
content.location: Left most route with bolts on the Panda Wall

climbs.name: Cookie Jar
climbs.fa: Aaron Connery, Jarrod Webb, Kevin Keith, and Josh Bradly. 2016

content.description:
Fun movements, trust your feet. All the holds are in the right spot. Pumpy at the top. Start just below the first bolt, watch out for the cacti. Shares the same anchor as the rest of the climbs.

 This climb is slightly different than the rest as the anchor is a bit to the left. Cleaning is a little tricky.Â
content.location: furthest bolted line to the right. Look for the lip and right facing flake near the top of the climb.

content.description: Left Facing corner center of the wall. Stay right of the bolts. Shares anchor with Panda Club and Voice of Reason.
content.location: Center of the wall. Look for the left/north facing corner.

content.description: This area is a surprisingly fun albeit short cliff that faces west. Routes vary from 5.4 to 5.10+. Routes are mostly bolted however supplemental gear is possible.
